abstract: Carl C. Icahn has given up his seat on Blockbuster’s board, citing Institutional Shareholder Services guidelines regarding how many directorships he can hold.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn has given up his seat on Blockbuster’s board, citing Institutional Shareholder Services guidelines regarding how many directorships he can hold.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has given up his seat on Blockbuster‘s board, citing Institutional Shareholder Services guidelines regarding how many directorships he can hold.
